QuestData.Title: The Trials Continue
QuestData.Description:
<Havi's voice continues in your head as the raven stares on>
If valor you seek, then to the bones you must speak!
But first you must prepare!
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, the hero of the hour! We must waste no time! $B$BOur business at hand is most important if you wish to succeed in your trials!
